articles.title: Mikel Arteta opens up on "big headache" which is giving him sleepless nights - Mirror Online
articles.description: Arsenal upset the odds to beat bitter rivals Chelsea 3-1 in their last outing, but it was a rare league victory in a dismal season which has taken its toll on manager Arteta
articles.content:

articles.title: Real Madrid 'fear £650,000-a-week Gareth Bale will have to return after Tottenham loan struggles' - Daily Mail
